abstract: Advertising column; Intel's internal advertising group Agency Inside, which was created in February 2015, is biggest step company has taken in its efforts to rebrand itself as something more than merely maker of computer processors.
lead_paragraph: Intel’s internal advertising group and video and digital studio have produced a slew of original content that shows some incredible ways innovators are using its technology.

headline.main: Intel Tells Stories That Go Beyond Chips
headline.print_headline: With Its Own Inside Agency, Intel Tells Stories That Go Beyond Chips

snippet: Intel’s internal advertising group and video and digital studio have produced a slew of original content that shows some incredible ways innovators are using its technology.
